name: nextjs-typescript
description: A spec2cloud shell template for building full-stack applications with: - **Frontend**: Next.js (TypeScript, App Router) - **Backend**: Express.js (TypeScript, Node.js) - **Deployment**: Azure Container Apps via AZD - **Testing**: Playwright (e2e) + Cucumber.js (Gherkin) + Vitest (unit)

scripts.dev:all: npx concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:api && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:cucumber && npm run test:e2e
